entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Prince Albert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -24.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Albert Airport 12:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -24.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -28.1°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
